// ******** INTEGER PARAMETERS ********
// Positive Integer Parameters

>> Abs(0)
0

>> Abs(2)
2

>> Abs(1E+308)


// Negative Integer Parameters

>> Abs(-0)
0

>> Abs(-2)
2

>> Abs(-1E+308)


// ******** DECIMAL PARAMETERS ********
>> Abs(2.2)
2.2

>> Abs(-2.2)
2.2

>> Abs(123456.789)
123456.789

>> Abs(-123456.789)
123456.789

// ******** NULL and ERROR PARAMETERS ********
>> Abs(1/0)
#Error(Kind=Div0)

>> IsError(Abs(1/0))
true

>> IsBlank(Abs(1/0))
#Error(Kind=Div0)

//Excel returns 0
>> Abs(Blank())
Blank()

//Excel returns true
>> Abs(Blank()) = 0
false

>> IsBlank(Abs(Blank()))
true

>> IsError(Abs(Blank()))
false

// ******** STRING PARAMETERS ********

>> Abs("sampleText")
#Error(Kind=InvalidArgument)

>> IsBlank(Abs("sampleText"))
#Error(Kind=InvalidArgument)

>> Abs("10")
10

>> Abs("-10.123")
10.123

// ******** BOOLEAN PARAMETERS ********

>> Abs(true)
1

>> Abs(false)
0

>> Abs("true")
#Error(Kind=InvalidArgument)

>> Abs("false")
#Error(Kind=InvalidArgument)

// ******** FUNCTION VALUE AS PARAMETERS ********

>> Abs(Date(1976, 12,23) - Date(2000, 01, 01))
8409

//Excel returns false, as the value of Abs(Date(2022, 10, 1)) in Excel is 44835 in General format, while in Date format its 10/1/2022
>> Abs(Date(2022, 10, 1)) = 1664607600000
true

//Abs(NaN)
